description: The mysterious cargo ship was drifting without crew on the high seas for more than a year.
title: Storm Dennis: 'Ghost ship' washes up on Irish coast
title_page: Storm Dennis: 'Ghost ship' washes up on Irish coast - BBC News
maintext: And there are still puzzles in the Alta's story that remains to be solved: who is its owner? And what was the cargo on board at the time it was abandoned? Answers may only be forthcoming once a decision on what to do with the Alta is reached.
